name: Under the Blood Moon
description:
As the bloodmoon rises you must fight your way through the night. A child was stolen from its mother and it is your responsibility to return it. After all that is your job. Defeat the creatures standing in your way and return what was thought lost.

This game was created during Global Game Jam 2021 under the theme "lost & found".  As most Game Jam projects it's not entirely finished. We hope you enjoy this short game! If you have any feedback feel free to leave a comment.

Controls

WALK  ||  AD

ACTION ||  Click on any button on the top left

Notes

- You can spam any attack or healing potion as much as you like

- Block doesn't do anything

Credits

Natalie Kuhrt || Art, Animation, Level Design

Tina Wolfrum || Programming, Game Design

Ingame Background Music by Max Meinicke
